technical_features.source_sentence: the optimized device achieves record-breaking performance metrics, including a luminance of 1.6 million nits
a current efficiency of 204.2 cd A⁻¹
the EQE of 29.2% is the best for QLEDs without implementing light extraction methods
the TE QLED fabricated using the index-lowering process shows a T50 of 15,600 h at 1000 cd m⁻²
an angular color shift of Δu’v’ = 0.0052 from 0° to 60° is achieved by narrowing the emission linewidth of quantum dots
the measured spectrum centers at 537 nm with a full width at half maximum (FWHM) narrowed from 21.5 to 19.2 nm
These QDs exhibit an improved photoluminescence quantum efficiency (PLQE) of 86.2% in the solution and an internal PLQE of 90.3% in solid films
the refractive indices of emissive QDs and ZnMgO nanoparticles are lowered by 0.15 and 0.17 (λ = 537 nm), respectively
the J-V curve and the notable sub-threshold turn-on (V = 1.9 V)

qualitative_insights.main_objective: Develop high-performance top-emitting green quantum-dot light-emitting diodes (QLEDs) with enhanced brightness, efficiency, stability, and negligible angular color shift
qualitative_insights.key_methodology_summary: Combined single-mode optical microcavity design with electrically optimized structures using refractive-index-lowering nanocrystal films and narrow-linewidth QD synthesis
primary_findings_conclusions: Operational lifetime (T₉₀) of 15,600 hours at 1000 nits
29.2% external quantum efficiency without light extraction
Internal PLQE of 90.3% in solid films
limitations_discussed_by_authors: Light extraction methods not yet implemented
Study focused on green emission only
qualitative_insights.novelty_significance_claim: First demonstration of electrically optimized single-mode green QLEDs combining record efficiency, stability, and angular color performance through refractive-index engineering and narrow-linewidth QDs
qualitative_insights.key_tables_figures_present: Figure 2 (device performance metrics), Figure 3 (angular color shift analysis), Figure 4 (optical-electrical balance optimization)
